Information about the file to update along with the new properties to set. The /files/update API accepts requests in the following format:

UpdateFileNameRequest Model - Request to update the name of a file.
projectId integer
required
example: 23456789
Project Id to which the file belongs.
oldFileName string
required
example: file1.py
The current name of the file.
newName string
required
example: file2.py
The new name for the file.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 23456789,
  "oldFileName": "file1.py",
  "newName": "file2.py"
}
UpdateFileContentsRequest Model - Request to update the contents of a file.
projectId integer
required
example: 23456789
Project Id to which the file belongs.
name string
required
example: main.py
The name of the file that should be updated.
content string
required
example: class CustomClass: def __init__(self): pass
The new contents of the file.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 23456789,
  "name": "main.py",
  "content": "class CustomClass:
    def __init__(self):
        pass
"
}
